text: Important characteristics: Typical problems: - Solid knowledge about usability « Controlling rather than supporting « Fast learner « Too focused on data collection - Can establish good relations to subjects « Sticks too close to test plan + Good memory « Appears better knowing - Good at listening « Does not establish good relations - Good at communicating « Jumps to conclusions « Can handle uncertainty - Flexible and capable of improvising « Can stay alert for a long time « Can maintain an overview
